title: Westworld.1973.DVDRip.CroBar
description:
Ok so I've uploaded some movie torrents, but this is my first ever attempt at an actual rip of my own. Let me know what you all think, thank you.

(This and the Michael Crichton Ebooks are my first "self done" torrents)

Take off on the vacation of your dreams... and wake up to your worst nightmare! From Jurassic Park creator Michael Crichton comes this excellent, ingenious sci-fi thriller about a Wild West Fantasyland where amazingly like-like androids look, act and talk like the real thing... until something goes horribly wrong! Staring Yul Brynner, Richard Benjamin and James Brolin, and bristling with excellent special effects*(for 1973), Westworld is a hi-tech, futuristic, edge-of-your-seat suspense thriller that will leave you breathless.

Peter Martin and John Blane (a nod to Crichton's alias John Lange) are two businessmen enjoying the ultimate frontier excursion. But when a programming error causes the town's "residents" to turn deadly,the two must square off against a strong-willed, steely-eyed, automated gunslinger who's determined to bring their vacation to a murderous conclusion.

I know it says 1280*720, this came direct from the video information, however the movie itself is not a remastered release, its the actual 1973 version and I believe its closer to 720*480.
